suite.name: Base

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=serverest, url=http://localhost:3000, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://localhost:3000/usuarios path_url=/usuarios headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None
${response} = <Response [200]>

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.
kw.msg: ${response} = <Response [200]>

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=serverest, url=http://localhost:3000, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
kw.msg: &{payload} = { nome=tony stark | email=tony.stark@gmail.com | password=test123 | administrador=true }

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:3000/usuarios path_url=/usuarios headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '80', 'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'} body=nome=tony+stark&email=tony.stark%40gmail.com&password=test123&administrador=true
${response} = <Response [201]>

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.
kw.msg: ${response} = <Response [201]>

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=serverest, url=http://localhost:3000, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
kw.msg: &{payload} = { nome=5 priest | email=testeiuq5@exemplo.com | password=123 | administrador=true }

kw.name: PUT On Session
kw.doc: Sends a PUT request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: PUT Request : url=http://localhost:3000/usuarios/YDwgzPU8CnGu5yzN path_url=/usuarios/YDwgzPU8CnGu5yzN headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '75', 'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'} body=nome=5+priest&email=testeiuq5%40exemplo.com&password=123&administrador=true
${response} = <Response [200]>

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.
kw.msg: ${response} = <Response [200]>
